headline.main: Ex-NFL Star Sharper Pleads Guilty to Attempted Sex Assault in Nevada
headline.print_headline: Ex-NFL Star Sharper Pleads Guilty to Attempted Sex Assault in Nevada

docs.snippet: Former NFL star Darren Sharper admitted on Tuesday to attempted sexual assault of two women in Las Vegas as part of a three-part plea bargain that prosecutors in Nevada, Arizona and California said would keep him in prison for at least nine years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former NFL star Darren Sharper admitted on Tuesday to attempted sexual assault of two women in Las Vegas as part of a three-part plea bargain that prosecutors in Nevada, Arizona and California said would keep him in prison for at least nine years.

headline.main: Stiller, Baumbach Unite Again in 'While We're Young'
headline.print_headline: Stiller, Baumbach Unite Again in 'While We're Young'

docs.snippet: In Noah Baumbach's "Greenberg," there's a scene where Ben Stiller, playing a prickly, neurotic 40-year-old, gazes fearfully at teenage kids around him at a Los Angeles party. "You're so sincere and interested in things," he sneers. "I hope I die b...
docs.lead_paragraph: In Noah Baumbach's "Greenberg," there's a scene where Ben Stiller, playing a prickly, neurotic 40-year-old, gazes fearfully at teenage kids around him at a Los Angeles party. "You're so sincere and interested in things," he sneers. "I hope I die before meeting any of you at a job interview."

headline.main: GOP Moves Ahead on Budget Plans; Eyes Obamacare Repeal Bill
headline.print_headline: GOP Moves Ahead on Budget Plans; Eyes Obamacare Repeal Bill

docs.snippet: House and Senate Republicans steamed ahead Tuesday toward likely approval of balanced budget outlines, essential early steps along a path to send President Barack Obama legislation to wipe out his five-year-old health care law and eliminate defici...
docs.lead_paragraph: House and Senate Republicans steamed ahead Tuesday toward likely approval of balanced budget outlines, essential early steps along a path to send President Barack Obama legislation to wipe out his five-year-old health care law and eliminate deficits within a decade.

headline.main: SEC's White Says 'Closely Monitoring' Proxy Access Efforts
headline.print_headline: SEC's White Says 'Closely Monitoring' Proxy Access Efforts

docs.snippet: Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Mary Jo White told lawmakers on Tuesday the agency would not try anew to craft rules to make it easier for shareholders to nominate corporate directors but that she was closely watching activists' attempts ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Mary Jo White told lawmakers on Tuesday the agency would not try anew to craft rules to make it easier for shareholders to nominate corporate directors but that she was closely watching activists' attempts to do just that.

docs.snippet: Grain futures were mixed Tuesday on the Chicago Board of Trade....
docs.lead_paragraph: Grain futures were mixed Tuesday on the Chicago Board of Trade.

headline.main: Vietnam Wants Full Lifting of US Arms Embargo
headline.print_headline: Vietnam Wants Full Lifting of US Arms Embargo

docs.snippet: Vietnam wants the U.S. to lift fully an embargo on arms sales that was eased last year, but Washington is calling for more progress by the communist-governed nation on improving human rights, their respective ambassadors said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Vietnam wants the U.S. to lift fully an embargo on arms sales that was eased last year, but Washington is calling for more progress by the communist-governed nation on improving human rights, their respective ambassadors said Tuesday.

headline.main: Atlantic City Turnaround Team Bets on Cuts Not Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Atlantic City Turnaround Team Bets on Cuts Not Bankruptcy

docs.snippet: A turnaround team tasked with reviving Atlantic City says New Jersey's struggling gambling hub must consider cost cuts, layoffs and longer bond maturities, but bankruptcy is not in the cards - yet....
docs.lead_paragraph: A turnaround team tasked with reviving Atlantic City says New Jersey's struggling gambling hub must consider cost cuts, layoffs and longer bond maturities, but bankruptcy is not in the cards - yet.

headline.main: Lockheed Likely to Lose Some Incentive Over F-35 Software Delay
headline.print_headline: Lockheed Likely to Lose Some Incentive Over F-35 Software Delay

docs.snippet: Lockheed Martin Corp is likely to lose some incentive fees due to delays in final delivery of the 2B software it is developing for the F-35 fighter jet, the Air Force general who runs the $391 billion program told reporters on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lockheed Martin Corp is likely to lose some incentive fees due to delays in final delivery of the 2B software it is developing for the F-35 fighter jet, the Air Force general who runs the $391 billion program told reporters on Tuesday.

headline.main: Obama: Netanyahu Statements Don't Clarify Two-State Solution
headline.print_headline: Obama: Netanyahu Statements Don't Clarify Two-State Solution

docs.snippet: An unconvinced President Barack Obama said Tuesday that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's efforts to clarify pre-election statements rejecting creation of a Palestinian state still do not appear to advance the prospect of a two-state sol...
docs.lead_paragraph: An unconvinced President Barack Obama said Tuesday that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's efforts to clarify pre-election statements rejecting creation of a Palestinian state still do not appear to advance the prospect of a two-state solution to Mideast peace.

headline.main: Mudslides kill five in central Peru
headline.sub: Mudslides kill five in central Peru

docs.snippet: Mudslides and flooding in Peru kill five and cause serious damage to roads and housing. Dan Fastenburg reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mudslides and flooding in Peru kill five and cause serious damage to roads and housing. Dan Fastenburg reports.
